description: The nova ec2 compatibility api sends a response differing from ec2 for simple string value types such as userData and disableApiTermination. They are missing the wrapper <value> xml element. This does not effect complex responses such as groupSet and blockDeviceMapping
title: DescribeInstanceAttribute userData missing value xml element

comments.content: The nova ec2 compatibility api sends a response differing from ec2 for simple string value types such as userData and disableApiTermination. They are missing the wrapper <value> xml element. This does not effect complex responses such as groupSet and blockDeviceMapping
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~evarlast

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/grizzly
